name: WeDigTech
tagline: Rapid Design Led Product Development Team
description:
WeDigTech is a trusted and leading end-to-end design-led digital product development company with its presence in more than 10 countries. With more than 150+ happy customers globally, we have delivered 350+ successful solutions for leading brands and startups in the space of healthcare, energy drinks, media, and entertainment, consulting, fin-tech, retail, smart cities and manufacturing.
Our Services - 
Mobile App & Product Development
We have expertise in mobile development for both Native & Cross-platform technologies. We have developed scalable mobile applications on technologies like Android, iOS, Sencha, Swift, PhoneGap & React Native.
Cloud Expertise
Our cloud expertise spans across all the major platforms i.e. Amazon Web Services (AWS) & Microsoft Azure with major line of products being developed with AWS Cloud Platform.
IoT Development
With IoT App Development, our aim is to build new & innovative products & deliver digital transformation. The IoT technologies and protocols we work upon are RFID, NFC, low-energy Bluetooth, low-energy wireless, low-energy radio protocols, and WiFi-Direct. 
AI Development
Our AI application development capability spans across Speech Recognition, Deep Learning (TensorFlow), Machine Learning, Python & Robotic Process Automation.
For more information,
